About the designer: The Row was established in 2006 by industry icons Ashley Olsen and Mary-Kate Olsen. Named in reverence of London's Savile Row, the fashion house emulates the bespoke standards of exceptional fabrics, impeccable details, and precise tailoring. The Row combines a timeless perspective with subtle attitudes which form an irreverent classic signature. The Row’s collections also explore the strength of simplistic shapes that speak to discretion and are based on uncompromising quality.

products.name: Kensington Extra Mini Shoulder Bag, , - Multicolour
products.brandedName: Kurt Geiger Kensington Extra Mini Shoulder Bag, , - Multicolour
products.unbrandedName: Kensington Extra Mini Shoulder Bag, , - Multicolour
products.description: Introducing the exquisite "KENSINGTON EXTRA MINI" shoulder bag by the renowned designer KURT GEIGER, embodying the essence of luxurious elegance. This unique creation captivates with its multicolored finish, featuring dominant hues of pink, purple, yellow, blue, and green, creating a striking and diverse color palette. The bold, large floral pattern adorning the bag makes it not only a practical accessory but also a distinctive statement piece that stands out in any crowd. Crafted from the highest quality leather, this bag ensures durability and a timeless appearance for years to come. The interior is lined with premium material, offering ample space for your essentials, including a dedicated card slot. Luxurious details such as the metal shield clasp adorned with a crown motif and a chain strap further accentuate the exclusive nature of this bag. The "Kensington Extra Mini" from the "FLORAL COUTURE" collection is designed for women who value not only functionality but also original design and luxurious finishes. Its rectangular shape and magnetic flap closure provide ease of use, while the option to wear it as a shoulder bag or crossbody adds versatility. WHY CHOOSE THIS PRODUCT? * Crafted from 100% LEATHER, ensuring durability and elegance. * Unique, colorful floral pattern adds charm and makes a statement. * Luxurious details, including gold and silver metal elements, such as the chain strap and crown-shaped clasp. * Practical interior compartment with a dedicated card slot for easy organization. * Versatile wear options as a shoulder bag or crossbody for added convenience.

products.description: Ari Mini Dress Ari Mini Dress 100% polyester. Made in Indonesia. Hand wash. Unlined. Pleated satin fabric with lettuce trim. BBAB-WD185. ARI. Doing the most while wearing the least, BAOBAB merges fashion with environmental passion. They design statement swimwear and resort wear in asymmetrical cuts and bold silhouettes that take sustainability to a whole new level. Turning waste into iconic pieces, almost every design is made out of plastic and fishing nets found in the ocean. For each piece sold, BAOBAB plants tropical trees and rehabilitates coral reefs throughout the Caribbean Sea in alliance with the Corales de Paz Organization.

products.name: x REVOLVE Giustina Maxi Dress
products.brandedName: Michael Costello x REVOLVE Giustina Maxi Dress
products.description: x REVOLVE Giustina Maxi Dress x REVOLVE Giustina Maxi Dress Self: 90% polyester 10% elastane Lining: 82% nylon 18% elastane. Made in China. Hand wash. Partially lined. Back lace-up closure. Mesh fabric. MELR-WD1070. MCD1121 U23. A specialist in statement gowns, Michael Costello has dressed the likes of Beyonce, Cardi B, Kim Kardashian, and Lady Gaga. He became a household name in 2010 after appearing on Project Runway, and has since established himself as a designer of sexy show-stoppers. Think draped, jewel-toned fabrics alongside curve-flattering silhouettes with high slits and open backs. Guided by the principle that everyone should feel confident when they dress, Michael Costello is meant to be worn by women of all shapes and sizes. It is the ideal label for those nights that call for something striking and unapologetic to strut, spin, and sashay in.
